item.title: About
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Results-driven software engineer with over 7 years of experience in the software industry, specializing in product development, deployment, and maintenance. Proven track record of contributing to 8+ products. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams, including design, business, and product management, to achieve product objectives. I bring a diverse perspective, having worked in both startup and large corporate environments. Detail-oriented and self-motivated, I excel in dynamic settings, utilizing my expertise to navigate and overcome new challenges.

item.title: Blog
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Scan a website for malicious URLs with AsyncURLCrawler and VirusTotal Dec 28, 2023 A malicious URL is a hyperlink with the intent of facilitating scams, attacks, and fraud. Clicking on such URLs may result in the downloading of ransomware, exposure to phishing or spearphishing emails, or engagement in various forms of cybercrime. In this blog post a method is presented to extract URLs inside a website and scan them automatically using VirusTotal.
